sentences.en: Armed soldiers guard the streets in this volatile atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 目前局势动荡不定，有武装士兵在街道上警戒。

sentences.en: As the lungs exhale this waste, gas is expelled into the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 肺呼出这些废气被排到空气中。

sentences.en: Egypt wants to solve the problem in an atmosphere of cordiality.
sentences.cn: 埃及想要友好地解决该问题。

sentences.en: He sets the atmosphere and shapes the scenes pleasingly.
sentences.cn: 他把气氛和场面调动得轻松愉快。

sentences.en: His main problem was the extremely smoky atmosphere at work.
sentences.cn: 他面临的主要问题就是：工作场所总是烟雾弥漫。

sentences.en: In the dining-room the draperies create an atmosphere of elegance.
sentences.cn: 在餐厅里，打褶装饰物能营造雅致的氛围。

sentences.en: Its atmosphere is one of repose rather than excitement.
sentences.cn: 那里气氛安宁而不热闹。

sentences.en: Mars has an insubstantial atmosphere, consisting almost entirely of carbon dioxide.
sentences.cn: 火星的大气层极其稀薄，几乎全部由二氧化碳构成。

sentences.en: The atmosphere at home was rather tense.
The hotel had a lovely relaxed atmosphere .
sentences.cn: 那家宾馆的气氛轻松愉快。

sentences.en: The house projects an atmosphere of calm and order.
sentences.cn: 这栋房子透着一种宁静和整齐感。

sentences.en: The interior of the shop still retains a nineteenth-century atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 这家商店的内部装修仍然保留着19世纪的风格。

sentences.en: The Martian atmosphere contains only tiny amounts of water.
sentences.cn: 火星的大气层中只含有极少量的水。

sentences.en: The music is pulsating and the atmosphere is intoxicating.
sentences.cn: 音乐在有节奏地响着，气氛令人陶醉。

sentences.en: The old harbour is still full of atmosphere and well worth visiting.
sentences.cn: 这座古老的港口依然充满了情趣，颇值得一游。

sentences.en: The shuttle Columbia will re-enter Earth's atmosphere tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚号航天飞机将在明天上午重进地球大气层。

sentences.en: The station would burn up on re-entry into the earth's atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 空间站在重返地球大气层时会被烧毁。

sentences.en: There's still an atmosphere of great hostility and tension in the city.
sentences.cn: 强烈的敌对和紧张气氛依然笼罩着这座城市。

sentences.en: These gases pollute the atmosphere of towns and cities.
sentences.cn: 这些气体污染城镇的空气。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 学业风气，学习氛围
易爆气体环境；爆燃性空气
炉气氛，炉内气氛；炉内蒙气
中性气氛；中性大气；中性蒙气
还原空气；还原性气氛；还原性蒙气

trans.tran_cn: 大气层，空气，氛围，环境，魅力
trans.tran_en: the feeling that an event or place gives you
